contentrichtext.text: {{Nihongo|'''Kobudō'''|古武道}} or '''Ko-budō''', a Japanese term meaning "old martial way", may refer to: * [[Koryū]]: A type of Japanese [[Martial arts|martial art]] which has kept its ancient mode of training and has been preserved and handed down from generation to generation (originating prior to 1886).<ref>''Japanese-English Dictionary of Kendo''. All Japan Kendo Federation. 2000. Page 52.</ref> * [[Okinawan kobudō]]: the martial arts weaponry systems originating on the island of [[Okinawa]]. ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Disambiguation|date=March 2012}} [[ca:Kobudo]] [[da:Kobudo]] [[de:Kobudō]] [[fr:Kobudō]] [[nl:Kobudo]] [[ja:古武道]] [[pl:Kobudō]] [[ro:Kobudo]] [[sl:Kobudo]] [[sv:Kobudo]]
